UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Genomewide Analysis of the Antimicrobial Peptides in Python bivittatus and Characterization of Cathelicidins with Potent Antimicrobial Activity and Low Cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Kim D, Soundrarajan N, Lee J, Cho HS, Choi M, Cha SY, Ahn B, Jeon H, Le MT, Song H, Kim JH, Park C

Literature.Title: Bactericidal activities and biochemical features of 16 antimicrobial peptides against bovine-mastitis causative pathogens
Literature.Author: Cho HS, Kim D, Jeon H, Somasundaram P, Soundrarajan N, Park C
